The pure definition of overrated. Maybe it brought lots of good things to the table, maybe it was a big deal back then but horrendous driving sequences, creative but weak guns and unsatisfying gunplay doesn't make this a masterpiece. Maybe I would have loved it when it came out but over a decade after its release, all it does is bring frustration. It's up there in the overrated, overblown department, right next to Pokemon, The Witcher and half the indie games on Steam.

I don't think it is a bad game, it is just extremely overrated. I found myself bored in lot of moments, especialy in the veicles parts. This game aged, the mechanics are not so briliant as you may read. The NPCs are generic and have similar behaviour when interacting to your character, reforcing the feeling of repetitiviness. I do recommend, though, trying this game if it is in a good discount. It is still very inovative if considering the launch date of this game. Just don't try it with large expectations.

Cuando Compre El Pack De Valve El Vernao Pasado Solo Por 15 Euros Y En Las Rebajas De Verano,Comenzaria Una Saga De Videojuegos Que Ni Yo Conocia,Aunque Habia Oido Hablar De Ella Por Lo Famosa Que Era Y Porque Es Considerada Hasta Hoy En Dia Como Una De Las Mejores Sagas De Videojuegos Jamas Creada Y Por Ser Muy Innovadora En Su Tiempo.Jugada Y Terminada La Primera Entrega Junto A Sus Expansiones(Opossing Force Y Blue Shift.),Me Parecian Una Joya Moderna Que Lo Empezo Todo(A Parte De Lo Innovadores Que Fueron Wolfenstein 3d Y Doom En Su Momento A Principios De Los 90.)En Los FPS De Pc,Hasta Ese Momento En Que Jugue Half Life 2.Creia Desde Un Momento Que No Iba A Estar A La Altura De Al Menos La Primera Entrega.Pero Me Equivoque.Lo Que Mas Me Sorprendio Del Juego En Si Fue La IA O Inteligencia Artificial,Que Si Ya Era Muy Buena En Half Life 1 Esa Perfeccion Se Mejoro En Half Life 2.Por Ejemplo,Cuando Estas En La Espalda De Una Persona Que Te Esta Hablando O Transmitiendo Informacion,Esta Se Gira Y Te Mira Para Seguir Hablandote,Lo Que En Half Life 1 No Pasaba.La Historia Es Muy Tipica De Las Peliculas De Ciencia Ficcion.Tras El Desastre De Black Mesa,Ese Misterioso Hombre Vestido Con Un Traje Azul Y Con Un maletin Marron(G-Man.) Le Dice Que Le Ha Llegado La Hora De Nuevo,Y Gordon Freeman Llega A Una Ciudad Misteriosa Llamada Ciudad 17 En La Que Existe Un Dictador Que Quiere Tener A Los Ciudadanos "Seguros"Tras La Liberacion De Black Mesa De Las Especies Alienigenas De El Planeta Fronterizo Que Podimos Ver En La Primera Entrega.Junto A Una Brutalidad Y Abuso Policial De Unos Soldados Al Servicio De Ese Dictador(Los Combines.)Y Unos Ciudadanos Ocultandose En Sus Viviendas Esperando A Que Esa Situacion Acabe.Tambien Tenemos Dos Bandos En El Juego.La Alianza(Formada Por Ese Dictador O El Dr. Breen,Antiguo Administrador De Black Mesa En La Epoca De Freeman Y Sus "Soldados",Los Combines.)Y La Resistencia,Formada Por Los Principales Lideres Que Pueden Ser Algunos Que Veamos o Nos AcompaÃ±en En El Juego,Como,Por Ejemplo,Alyx,Hija Del Cientifico Que Nos Mando Pedir Ayuda A La Superficie Tras La Catastrofe De Black mesa(El Dr.Eli.)Y Junto Con Ingenieros Cientificos Tambien Conocidos De Gordon Freeman,Como El Dr.Kleiner(El Cual Tiene Una Mascota Headcrab,Lamar.)Y Un Guia Y Combatiente,Antiguo Guardia De Seguridad De Black Mesa,Barney Calhoun,El Cual Controlabamos Como Protagonista En Half life:Blue Shift,Y Con El Cual Nos Cruzabamos Un Par De Veces En Black Mesa,Ademas De UN Robot Construido Por Eli Para Proteger A Su Hija,Un Robot Capaz De Destruir Cualquier Cosa Y Levantarla O Lanzarla,Dog.Ademas,En El Juego Tambien Somos Capaces De Manejar A Escuadrones De Aliados De La Resistencia,Como A Apoyo,Medicos Que Son Capaces De Curar A Gordon O Hasta A Aliados Y Lanza-Cohetes.Las Armas Son Variadas Y Con Muchas Funciones,Como En Su Primera Entrega,Pero Las Especies Alienigenas O Las Especies De Enemigos No Son Muchas Mas Que Su Primera Entrega.Pese A Que Los Escenarios Son linealies,Siempre Te Encontraras Alfgo Nuevo,Como Las Armas O Los Alienigenas/Enemigos En El Juego,Que Te Sorprenderan(Lo Que Pasa En Casi Todas Las Entregas.)Y Los Graficos No Decepcionan,Es Lo Mejor En Su Epoca,Y Lo Sorprendente Es Que Es Del AÃ±o 2004,En El Que Otros Juegos De Valve De Ese Mismo AÃ±o No Cumplian Las Mismas Espectativas Que Con Este Motor Source Innovador.Recomiendo Comprarlo,Tampoco Es Que Me Queje Mucho Del Precio,Pese A Que Tenemos Logros De Steam Para Intentar Pasar El Juego Al 100%,Y Tambien Tenemos Lugares Ocultos Y Secretos.Aunque Con Cada Juego De Valve,Dependiendo Del Precio,Claro,Siempre Recomiendo Comprarlo De Rebajas,Y Mejor Aun Si Lo Compramos Con Toda La Saga De Half Life Y Demas Sagas De Valve Tan Famosas Como Esa,Con El Pack De Valve Rebajado.

Playing in 2018 on a potato netbook laptop with ubuntu. It runs like a dream and the game itself is by far one of the best fps ever made. The enemies are challenging and puzzles are fun. 10 stars!

(Product recieved for free, it was a gift from a friend.)

Graphics: 8/10. Pretty good. High resolution, high poly, map detailing was good, everything was drawn well.

Gameplay: 10/10. Weapons, enemies, and maps are balanced, unique, and just plain fun. I rarely got stuck, and everything was just fun to do. There are some mechanics that were just fucking amazing (not gonna spoil though). There aren't any damage sponges or overpowered weapons, and there are no direct weapon upgrades (as in every weapon is useful in some situation). The levels are well designed and there are plenty of enemies to keep things interesting. I would go so far as to call the gameplay "really fucking awesome". I'd give it 15-20 hours playtime (took me 20, but i kinda suck at it).
On to one of my few big complaints: the vehicle sections. They're good, but they just get repetitive. It's boring. I still enjoyed them overall, but towards the end of each one i really just wanted it to be over.
The final boss sucked. It was easy, boring, and anticlimatic. I say this as someone that's not very good at FPS.

Music: 10/10. During some intense fights, music will play. It's awesome. The music is good. Not much to say.

Acting: 2/10. I'm writing this for the sole purpose of ranting about how ridiculously shitty the acting is. The voice acting, the expressions, the movements, the timing, and the script itself are just terrible. It's cringey on top of annoying on top of i hate these characters. Breen and the G man are exempt from all of this, they're awesome. Alyx is partially exempt, she was bearable. Same with Father Grigori. But Barney, Eli, Dr. Kleiner, and all the NPCs were just the fucking worst. On second thought, Breen was really fucking perfect and awesome. He almost makes up for the other characters.

Story: 10/10. Answers almost every question half life left, then makes twice as many. It's dramatic and full of world building. There are tons of areas that tell a story, just cool tiny details in general. It really makes you hate the combine. The story itself is good. Pretty simple, kinda standard dystopian sci-fi. Now that i think about it, it's not the actual story i'm talking about, it's more just creating a world and making you feel like this is a real universe. That's what gets a 10/10. Really, the story gets like a 5/10. [spoiler]I wanna give an example of what i'm trying to say: Towards the end of the game, i walked into an apartment with a dead, rotting corpse sitting relaxed in an armchair. His arms were on the armrests, he was sitting back, and his TV was on. The combine had stormed in there and shot the guy dead before he could get up or react at all. He was 100% innocent, and he died watching propaganda. It was just murder for the sake of murder. That's the kind of shit i consider really good wordbuilding.[/spoiler]

Difficulty: Pretty easy. There were a couple hard parts, but nothing that was [i]hard[/i] hard. Then again, i played on easy, so i guess it's exactly what it says. Not much got boring, everything still had some challenge to it, even if i wouldn't call it hard.

Conclusion: 9/10. Don't wait for a sale, the game is 100% worth it. It's really good.
